title: 下载G键合成表后游戏无法启动
author: Pegasus
txt_content:
具体情况如下




---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Oops.

replies.author: qq2656896054
replies.txt_content: Forge版本太落后或者与其它mod冲突，试试更新一下Forge

replies.txt_content:
